data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 59,072 believers in Grand'Anse that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Grand‘Anse, Haiti
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Grand'Anse a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Grand‘Anse, Haiti know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Grand'Anse hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Jesus, make the 260,553 people in the state of Grand'Anse who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Grand‘Anse, Haiti find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Grand'Anse.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Grand'Anse
location.cities_list: Jérémie, Dame-Marie, Corail, Les Irois, Moron
location.cities_list_w_pop: Jérémie (97,503), Dame-Marie (6,036), Corail (2,782), Les Irois (2,265), Moron (1,830)
